text.name: info1
text.text: The Master System is the 8-bit video game console produced by Sega, to compete with the Nintendo Entertainment System.

text.name: info1
text.text: Master System é o console de videogame de 8-bits produzido pela Sega, para concorrer com o Nintendo Entertainment System.

text.name: info1
text.text: The Master System is the 8-bit video game console produced by Sega, to compete with the Nintendo Entertainment System.

text.name: info1
text.text: Master System es la consola de videojuegos de 8 bits producida por Sega, para competir con Nintendo Entertainment System.

text.name: info1
text.text: Master System est la console de jeu vidéo 8 bits produite par Sega, pour concurrencer la Nintendo Entertainment System.

text.name: info1
text.text: Master System ist die 8-Bit-Videospielkonsole von Sega, die mit dem Nintendo Entertainment System konkurrieren soll.
